title: fix(ui): input changes lost on focus in dataset item edit

body: > [!IMPORTANT] > Fix input changes being lost on focus in dataset item edit by using `form.reset` and adding `key` prop for re-rendering. > > - **Behavior**: > - Use `form.reset` instead of `form.setValue` in `EditDatasetItem.tsx` to initialize form values, preventing loss of input changes on focus. > - Add `key` prop to `EditDatasetItem` in `itemId.tsx` to force re-render on dataset item ID change. > - **Misc**: > - Change dependency in `useEffect` from `datasetItem` to `datasetItem?.id` in `EditDatasetItem.tsx`. > > This description was created by [](https://www.ellipsis.dev?ref=langfuse%2Flangfuse&utm_source=github&utm_medium=referral) for 7a065f090f921c8ff269a3ea95e18b4fcbe20f8f. It will automatically update as commits are pushed.
